long_description: At the campsite, tailgate party or backyard barbeque, this stainless-steel jug will keep your drinks cold for hours on end. Tough stainless-steel casing stands up to lots of use and abuse. Drip-resistant faucet fills your cup up fast and won't leave a mess behind. Interior lining resists odors and stains. Bail handle accommodates easy transport. Drinking cup included.
short_description: At the campsite, tailgate party or backyard barbeque, this stainless-steel jug will keep your drinks cold for hours on end.
